search_results.snippet:
A euphemism /jufmzm/ is a generally innocuous word or expression used 
in place of one that may be found offensive or suggest something unpleasant. 
Some euphemisms are intended to amuse; while others use bland, inoffensive 
terms for things the user wishes to downplay. .... word) to form a euphemism is 
known as taboo deformation, or "minced oath".
